TopicTitle: Is there any way to get new sun flares without the scatterer mod?

Articles.Content: Sorry if this is the wrong place to ask

You need a mod in some form, no way to do it wihout. Perhaps Texture Replacer can be a more lightweight alternative, but it's also a bit less intuitive to use. Look up a guide.

However, Scatterer also has buttons to turn everything it does off. So you could use the mod without having it eat your FPS.

I remember a Texture Replacer texture pack named 'Interstellar' (that also required EVE to function) or something like that. It managed to change the sun-flare to white. It should still be in the curse forums,

But I think Streetwind's method of turning everything off and using sun-flares is a better option. So +1 to that.
